member.name: T:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest
member.summary: Testing class for the gestform algorithm.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.DictionnaryCountTest
member.summary: Testing if the amount of values generated by the gestform algorithm is equal the size wanted as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.DictionnaryArgumentOutOfRangeTest
member.summary: Testing if the is raised when using a negative integer as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.IsMultiple3Test
member.summary: Testing if return true when passing a multiple of 3 as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.IsNotMultiple3Test
member.summary: Testing if return false when passing a non multiple of 3 as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.IsMultiple5Test
member.summary: Testing if return true when passing a multiple of 5 as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.IsNotMultiple5Test
member.summary: Testing if return false when passing a non multiple of 5 as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.GetGesteFromGestformValueTest
member.summary: Testing if return "Geste" when passing a multiple of 3 as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.GetFormeFromGestformValueTest
member.summary: Testing if return "Forme" when passing a multiple of 3 as parameter.

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.GetGestformFromGestformValueTest

member.name: M:GestformTest.GestformLibraryTest.GetNumberFromGestformValueTest
